Chemical Inhibition of Viruses 167 

27. Horsfall, F. L., Jr. Experiments on chemical alteration of virus 
 infections. The Harvey Lectures, Series 48 (1952/53): 35-67, 1954. 

28. Horsfall, F. L., Jr. On the reproduction of influenza virus; quan- 
 titative studies with procedures which enumerate infective and 
 hemagglutinating virus particles, /. Exptl. Med., 100:\S5-\6l, 
 1954. 

29. Horsfall, F. L., Jr., and Ginsberg, H. S. The dependence of the 
 pathological lesion upon the multiplication of pneumonia virus 
 of mice (PVM). /. Exptl. Med., 93:139-150, 1951. 

30. Horsfall, F. L., Jr., and McCarty, M. The modifying effects of 
 certain substances of bacterial origin on the course of infection 
 with pneumonia virus of mice (PVM). /. Exptl. Med., 85:623- 
 646, 1947. 

31. Lwoff, A. Lysogeny. Bad. Rev., 17:269-337, 1953. 

32. Mogabgab, W. J., and Horsfall, F. L., Jr. Effect of sodium mono- 
 fluroacetate on the multiplication of influenza viruses, mumps 
 virus, and pneumonia virus of mice (PVM). /. Exptl. Med., 
 96:531-548, 1952. 

33. Morgan, C, Ellison, S. A., Rose, H. M., and Moore, D. H. In- 
 ternal structure of herpes simplex, influenza and vaccinia viruses 
 as revealed by the electron microscope. Fed. Proc, 13:506, 1954. 

34. Schlesinger, R. W. Developmental stages of viruses. Ann. Rev. 
 Microbiol, 7:83-112, 1953. 

35. Tamm, I., Folkers, K., and Horsfall, F. L., Jr. Inhibition of in- 
 fluenza virus multiplication by alkyl derivatives of benzimidazole: 

I. Kinetic aspects of inhibition by 2,5-dimethylbenzimidazole as 
 measured by infectivity titrations. /. Exptl. Med., 98:219-227, 
 1953. 

36. Tamm, I., Folkers, K., and Horsfall, F. L., Jr. Inhibition of in- 
 fluenza virus multiplication by alkyl derivatives of benzimidazole: 

II. Measurement of inhibitory activity by hemagglutination titra- 
 tions. /. Exptl. Med., 98:229-243, 1953. 

37. Tamm, I., Folkers, K., Shunk, C. H., Heyl, D., and Horsfall, F. L., 
 Jr. Inhibition of influenza virus multiplication by alkyl deriva- 
 tives of benzimidazole: III. Relationship between inhilDitory ac- 
 tivity and chemical structure. /. Exptl. Med., 98:245-259, 1953. 

38. Tamm, I., Folkers, K., Shunk, C. H., and Horsfall, F. L., Jr. In- 
 hibition of influenza virus multiplication by N-glycosides of 
 benzimidazoles. /. Exptl. Med., 99:227-250, 1954. 

39. Tamm, I., and Tyrrell, D. A. J. Personal communication. 

40. Visconti, N., and Delbriick, M. The mechanism of genetic re- 
 combination in phage. Genetics, 38:5-33, 1953. 

41. Williams, R. C, and Eraser, D. Morphology of the seven T-bac- 
 teriophages. J. Bad., 66:458-464, 1953.
